instruction: Classify the given article as either politics, sports, or science.
input: Humans have discovered evidence of liquid water on Mars.
output: Science

instruction: Rewrite the sentence in reported speech.
input: He said, "I want to go for a walk."
output: He said that he wanted to go for a walk.

instruction: Come up with a short story revolving around the given theme.
output: John and Melissa were two star-crossed lovers from different social backgrounds. When their families found out about their relationship, things got tough very quickly. But nothing could stop their love for each other. They stayed strong through the familial resistance and proved to the world that love, despite all odds, can prevail. In the end, they got their happily ever after.

instruction: Suggest a recipe for a classic Italian dish.
output:
This classic Italian dish is sure to be a hit with your family and friends. To make it, you will need the following ingredients: 1 pound of your favorite Italian pasta, 2 tablespoons of olive oil, 2 cloves of garlic (chopped), 2 cups of heavy cream, ½ cup of grated Parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon of Italian seasoning, and 1 cup of cooked Italian sausage.

Start by bringing a pot of salted water to a boil, then add the pasta and cook until it is al dente. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and stir until lightly browned.

Next, add the heavy cream and simmer over medium-low heat for 3-4 minutes. Then, stir in the Parmesan cheese and Italian seasoning and mix until everything is combined.

Add the cooked pasta and cooked sausage to the cream mixture, stirring until everything is well blended. Serve your classic Italian dish with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese and a garnish of fresh parsley. Enjoy!

instruction: Classify a fish as either an anadromous or a catadromous species.
output: Anadromous. Sockeye Salmon are anadromous fish, meaning they migrate from fresh water to salt water to complete their life cycle. They start their life in fresh water, then migrate down to the ocean where they live and grow before returning to freshwater to spawn.

instruction: Generate a captivating story of a student attending a prestigious school and grappling with personal moral issues.
output:
Felicia had always dreamed of attending the most prestigious school in the world. As she walked through the courtyard on the first day of classes at her new school, she felt the weight of a thousand possible futures, of possibilities and dreams resting on her fragile shoulders. 

But when Felicia quickly realized that the wealthy students were often cruel, and the pressure to strive for perfect grades was ever present, she wondered if her dream had come at too great a cost. In a private moment of loneliness, Felicia wondered if she would be able to keep her values intact when so many of her friends were willing to do whatever it took to win.

However, she quickly found solace and kinship in unexpected places, with the gardener and the cleaners cheering her on through each hurdle. With their support and her own willingness to fight for her beliefs, Felicia slowly but surely made a name for herself for her integrity and strength of moral character. With a newfound clarity and courage, she continued to pursue her goals and dreams, learning valuable lessons about distinguishing right from wrong as she went along.

instruction: Rewrite the following poem, maintaining the original grammar and rhyme scheme but changing the content.
input:
Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Sugar is sweet,
And so are you.
output:
Stars are bright,
Moonbeams are fair,
Laughter is lovely,
And so is your hair.

instruction: Name one of the computer commands.
output: One of the computer commands is "copy", which is used to copy files or folders from one location to another. It can also be used to create duplicate items.

instruction: Suggest three ways to resolve a family dispute.
output:
Three ways to resolve a family dispute are as follows:

1. Open communication: Encourage family members to openly discuss the issue at hand, while being mindful of the emotions of others.

2. Respectful negotiation: Try to reach consensus through respectful negotiation. Each family member should try to understand the other’s point of view and come to an agreement that is beneficial for all.

3. Seek professional help: If the family dispute is severe, it may be beneficial to seek help from a qualified professional. A therapist or counselor can help to mediate the situation and offer impartial advice. Alternatively, couples counseling can help to address underlying issues that have led to the dispute.

instruction: Generate a unique story featuring two characters and a moral lesson.
output:
Once there were two brothers, Jake and Sam, who lived on the same farm in the countryside. Jake was diligent and worked hard every day to help out on the farm, while Sam was lazy and often wasted his time doing nothing. 

One day, the two brothers decided to go fishing. Jake managed to catch a large fish, which he proudly displayed to his brother, while Sam had caught nothing. Sam grew jealous of his brother's success and decided to try and take it for himself. In the struggle for the fish, it was dropped and returned to the water. 

Moral of the story: Greed will always lead to loss, while hard work and diligence will lead to success.

instruction: Suggest a business idea that uses artificial intelligence.
output: A business idea that uses artificial intelligence is an AI-powered virtual assistant service. This service could use AI technology to build user profiles, record and store user data, and provide automated customer service. The virtual assistant could use natural language processing to answer customer questions, provide product recommendations, and offer personalized experiences to create a unique and seamless customer journey.

instruction: Write an email introducing yourself to an employer.
output:
Dear [Employer],

My name is [Your Name] and I am writing to introduce myself as a potential candidate for the [Position] position at [Company Name]. I am a highly motivated and energetic individual with extensive knowledge and experience in [Relevant Industry] that I believe could be a great asset to the company.

My current position at [Company Name] has enabled me to develop my skills in [Relevant Skill], and I have also worked on several projects that showcase my expertise in this field. I am confident my experience and qualifications will make me an ideal fit for the job. 

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to hearing from you and discussing the position further.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

instruction: Reword the following sentence, preserving the same structure and meaning:
input: I am very disappointed by your actions.
output: I am highly displeased with your behavior.

instruction: Identify a weakness of using text-based dialogue with a conversational AI.
output: One weakness of using text-based dialogue with a conversational AI is that it can be difficult for the AI to recognize subtle nuances in language. Without being able to accurately detect and interpret the user's intent, the AI may provide the wrong response or be unable to understand the conversation. Additionally, text-based dialogue may not always be the most engaging or user-friendly way of interacting with an AI.

instruction: Describe the sound of the wind on a sunny day.
output: The sound of the wind on a sunny day is like a gentle whisper, swirling around you and carrying with it the warmth of the sun.

instruction: Compare and contrast Hinduism and Buddhism.
output: Hinduism and Buddhism are two of the major religions of the world. They both share many core beliefs, such as a belief in karma and reincarnation. However, there are some significant differences between the two. For example, Hinduism is polytheistic while Buddhism is non-theistic and focuses on meditation and achieving enlightenment. Additionally, Hinduism focuses on caste systems while Buddhism does not.

instruction: Identify a similarity and a difference between a triangle and a square.
output: The similarity between a triangle and a square is that both shapes have three sides. The difference is that a triangle has three equal sides, while a square has four equal sides.

instruction: Explain how cultural norms vary among societies.
output: Cultural norms vary among societies based on their history and experiences. Cultural norms are shaped by a society's values, beliefs, and customs, and can differ from one region to the next. Some cultural norms may be seen as universal, while others may be more specific to an individual area or group. Cultural norms also change over time as values, beliefs, and customs evolve.

instruction: Write a short story about a girl who discovers a magical object with strange powers.
output: The girl was walking through the forest on a sunny day when she stumbled across a strange object in the mossy ground. She squatted down to have a closer look and, to her surprise, the object started to glow. The girl slowly reached out and, as her fingers grazed the surface, the object emitted a sudden burst of energy that filled the air around her with a magical light. As she held it, the girl could feel its powers and she began to understand that this magical object had the power to grant her one wish. She thought hard and wished for the courage to go on an adventure and explore the world. Suddenly, the object disappeared in a puff of smoke and the girl set off on her journey, full of hope and excitement.

instruction: Combine the following list of English words into one sentence
output: We can explore the darkness even if we are blinded by the light.

instruction: Describe how the element Carbon is formed
output: Carbon is formed mainly through the fusion of helium nuclei in the cores of stars, which is known as the triple-alpha process. As stars age, they become hotter and denser, increasing the rate of this process. This process releases an enormous amount of energy, which allows a star to shine. As the helium nuclei fuse, they release energetic particles that can hit nearby nuclei and cause them to fuse as well. Carbon is the most common element created in this process, followed by oxygen, nitrogen, and other elements up to iron.

instruction: Write a set of instructions to create a greeting card using Adobe Photoshop
output:
1. Open Adobe Photoshop
2. Create a new canvas, setting the width and height to the size of the card you desire 
3. Set the background color of the canvas using the eyedropper tool 
4. Insert any photos or backgrounds you want onto the canvas 
5. Add any text or shapes you want to the canvas 
6. Add any effects such as gradients, blurs, etc. to make the card more visually appealing 
7. Once you are satisfied with the card, export it as a .jpg file

instruction: Generate instructions to clean a messy bedroom
output:
1. Start by making the bed. Gather the sheets and blankets, straighten the mattress and make sure the bed is tidy.
2. Gather all the clothes and put them in the laundry basket.
3. Dust and clean all surfaces and furniture.
4. Vacuum or sweep the floor.
5. Remove any clutter from the surfaces and put it away in its proper place. 
6. Make sure to empty any trash cans and recycling bins in the room.
7. If any surfaces need to be washed, use a cleaner and wipe them down.
8. Finally, tidy up any loose items. Put books back onto the shelves, toys back into their containers, and paperwork into folders.

instruction: Create a poem with the following words: Spring, New, Love, Blaze.
output:
In spring a new love would blaze
A spark of delight that amaze
A spark so tender and so sweet
That through the night our love does fleet
Darling, come be mine forever
Let us our hearts bind together
A flame of love that will not wane
An everlasting love we've gained.

instruction: Write a story starting with "He had always wanted to visit the moon".
output:
He had always wanted to visit the moon ever since he was a kid, but it seemed like a farfetched dream. He was in college now, and he was still dreaming of this incredible achievement. He read books, researched topics, and kept up to date with the latest news and trends in space exploration. Finally, after years of hard work, he had accumulated enough money to make his dream come true. He bought a ticket to a space shuttle, and on the night of the launch, his entire family was there to see him off. 

The ride to the moon was filled with a mix of excitement and nervousness. He was finally achieving something he had always wanted to do. After a few days of travel, they finally arrived. He stepped out of the shuttle and was in awe of the beauty of the moon. The stars that he had read about and dreamt of, were right there in the sky. The craters and mountains that he had read about were right there too. He had an emotional moment as he realized he was actually standing on the moon. He had made it. 

He spent days exploring every nook and cranny of the surface of the moon. He wandered around, soaking in the beauty of these strange and majestic landscapes he had only seen in books. After a few weeks of exploring, he was finally ready to go back home. As he took the first few steps back on to earth, he couldn't help but feel a sense of accomplishment, of pride, and happiness. He had made it. He had finally visited the moon.
